column4: i don't know if this helps -- but it didn't work in KDE either, and since synaptic/adept updated firefox to 3.0, I don't have the little FF icon in the menu either (just the blank generic program icon)
your firefox launcher must be broken, you are not expected to have a generic, but the default one with the firefox icon
check that you have an /usr/share/applications/firefox.desktop file
